name: Game of Tanks
description:
The Tanks Game   -   Version 0.1 Public Beta

This is a project based on the KidsCanCode Youtube tutorials.

This game brings a simple map to test all the mechanics, weapons, animations,
camera movements and a simple event system.

You can leave a comment with your impressions or suggestions.

Thanks for playing, I hope you enjoy it.

Credits :

Graphics:
 TileMap & obstacles - Kenney Free Assets
 Tanks & projectiles - Craftpix Free Assets
 Sound Effects:
 Weapons, ammo & explosions - Q009 Sounds (opengameart)
 Music:
 Title Screen - "The Tread of War"  Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)
 Game Music - "March2"  by Spring (opengameart)
